entities.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
entities.description: A horror-themed game where players explore a haunted house and face unexpected challenges.

entities.name: Cultural Bridge
entities.description: The Renaissance is considered a cultural bridge between the Middle Ages and modern history, marking a significant shift in European culture.

entities.name: Eclipse
entities.description: A space exploration and conquest game where players build fleets and expand their empires.

entities.name: Risk
entities.description: A strategy game where players aim to conquer the world by controlling territories.

entities.name: Dixit

entities.name: Terraforming Mars
entities.description: A strategy game where players work to terraform the planet Mars.

entities.name: Carcassonne
entities.description: A tile-placement game where players build a medieval landscape.

entities.name: Brass: Lancashire

entities.name: Royal Tombs
entities.description: Royal tombs are burial places for royalty and high-ranking officials.

entities.name: Root
entities.description: A strategy game set in a woodland world where players control different factions.

entities.name: Cultural Traditions
entities.description: Practices, customs, and traditions that are passed down from one generation to another within a culture or society.

entities.name: afterlife

entities.name: Zhou Dynasty
entities.description: The Zhou Dynasty was an ancient Chinese dynasty that lasted from 1046 BC to 256 BC. It is known for significant cultural and political developments, including the emergence of important board games like Go.

entities.name: Cultural Values
entities.description: The social dynamics and values of different cultures, such as the struggle between opposing forces in Checkers.

entities.name: COMMONERS

entities.name: Middle East

entities.name: printing technology
entities.description: Printing technology refers to the methods and processes used for reproducing text and images on a medium, such as paper or cloth. It has played a crucial role in the dissemination of information and cultural artifacts.
